attributes.action: stop over-stating the number of girls playing football and improve the facilities for them.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The number of girls playing football is over-stated as it double-counts girls who play for more than one Club and maybe their County.
The Girls game needs better facilities - decent coaches, more refs, and better pitches.
Many girls are leaving the game because squads aren't rotated and they don't get a game.
